text:
[Verse]
Feet on the pavement
Sky cries down
Splash in puddles
Spin around

[Verse 2]
Laughing echoes
Drops on skin
Drenched in freedom
Let it in

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the magic plain
Heartbeat like a drum
Underneath the sun

[Verse 3]
Clouds are drifting
Morning's gray
Joy in moments
Here to stay

[Verse 4]
Thunder's singing
Lightning bright
Find the rhythm
In the night

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the magic plain
Heartbeat like a drum
Underneath the sun
title: Dancing in the Rain
